com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation.fra

Class AbstractFraFunction<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation.AbstractCalculationFunction<FraTrade,ScenarioResult<T>>
      • com.opengamma.strata.function.calculation.fra.AbstractFraFunction<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the return type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CalculationFunction<FraTrade>, CalculationSingleFunction<FraTrade,ScenarioResult<T>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FraBucketedGammaPv01Function, FraBucketedPv01Function, FraExplainPvFunction, FraParRateFunction, FraParSpreadFunction, FraPv01Function, FraPvFunction

    public abstract class AbstractFraFunction<T>
extends AbstractCalculationFunction<FraTrade,ScenarioResult<T>>
    Perform calculations on a single FraTrade for each of a set of scenarios.

      • execute

        public ScenarioResult<T> execute(FraTrade trade,
                                 CalculationMarketData marketData)
        Description copied from interface: CalculationSingleFunction
        Calculates a value for the target using multiple sets of market data.

        If the calculated value contains any currency amounts and implements CurrencyConvertible the calculation engine will automatically convert the amounts into the reporting currency.

        Parameters:
        trade - the target of the calculation
        marketData - the market data used in the calculation
        Returns:
        the result of the calculation

      • defaultReportingCurrency

        public Optional<Currency> defaultReportingCurrency(FraTrade target)
        Description copied from interface: CalculationFunction
        Returns the default reporting currency for the result of performing the calculation for the target if there is a sensible default.

        This is the currency to which currency amounts are converted if the reporting rules don't specify a reporting currency. This is normally the 'natural' currency for the trade, for example the currency of a FRA or the base currency of an FX forward.

        The default implementation returns an empty optional.

        Parameters:
        target - the target of the calculation
        Returns:
        the default reporting currency for the target if there is a sensible default

      • execute

        protected abstract T execute(ExpandedFra product,
                             RatesProvider provider)
